title: Direct Z-scheme Cu<sub>2</sub>O/WO<sub>3</sub>/TiO<sub>2</sub> nanocomposite as a potential supercapacitor electrode and an effective visible-light-driven photocatalyst
content:

Source: Journal of Environmental Management, Volume 363

Author(s): Jenny Hui Foong Chau, Chin Wei Lai, Bey Fen Leo, Joon Ching Juan, Kian Mun Lee, Xuefeng Qian, Irfan Anjum Badruddin, Jiantao Zai
